title: Thannaane Thamara Poo Lyrics Periyanna
stanzas:
Pacholay Keethukulla
padhungi nikkura pasangalukku
maranji nikkura
paruvam vandhuruchu
maamanukku seiyyum seeru
selavum vanthuruchu

Thannaane thaamara poo
maamaa thalaadum thanniyila
ye thaamara  poothiruche
maamaa thaavani vaangi vaanga

Thannaane thaamara poo
pulla thalaadum thanniyila
ye thaamara  poothiruche
pulla thaavani vaangi vaaren

kottura paniyila naanum
unakku kodaiya marattumaa
un vettura vizhiyila moottura
neruppula kulirum kaayatumaa

unakku enakku manasu ippa
vaikka piriyaachu
oliva maraiva pesi sirikka
oada thunaiyaachu

kaiyyila anaikkura podhu
nee thulli kudhikkira maanu
aathula kulikkira podhu
nee aala kadikkura meenu

un iduppu seela nazhuva
naan eduthu eduthu thazhuva

ye Thannaane thaamara poo
maamaa thalaadum thanniyila
ye thaamara  poothiruche
pulla thaavani vaangi vaaren

thinamum enna thorathuthaiya
unga perum moochu
aththi pooththa maayam pola
maamaa un pechu

kanne unakku minmini pudichi
velakkaa yethatumaa
vidiyira varaikkum madiyila
saanji vishiyam sollattumaa

maaman tharanum seeru
rendu maangaa thattu thoadu
nee sirikkura thanga thaeru
un thevai enna kelu

vedala pulla naanum
oru vevaram ketka vendum.

Thannaane thaamara poo
pulla thalaadum thanniyila
ye thaamara  poothiruche
maamaa thaavani vaangi vaanga

Thannaane thaamara poo
maamaa thalaadum thanniyila
ye thaamara  poothiruche
pulla thaavani vaangi vaaren
